overview.en: Bincentive is a smart mirror trading platform that connects trading experts and investors.  We create a win-win scenario for both parties with an innovative financial trading model. BCNP is the premier token for token sales Investors and will serve as a reward for establishing the Bincentive ecosystems.
overview.zh: Bincentive是连接交易专家及投资者的智能跟投交易平台。 BCNP Token将用于Bincentive平台进行私募及生态系建立的奖励使用，以创造交易专家及投资者的双赢局面并创造新的金融交易模式。
